Street.description: Street address including street name, street number, building number, apartment etc

CityCode.description: UN/LOCODE city code (5 letter) or IATA city code (3 letter)

CityName.description: If no CityCode provided, full name of the city

RegionName.description: If no StateCode provided, full name of the region / state / province / canton

CountryName.description: If no CountryCode provided, full country name

AddressCodeType.description: Type of address code e.g. US CBP FIRMS

AddressCode.description: Address identifier using special coding systems e.g. US CBP FIRMS code
